paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for KCNH2, including penetrance data.

functional_data.summary: Splice-site analysis suggests disruption of the splice acceptor of exon 5, likely leading to reduced Kv11.1 protein.

variants.additional_notes: This variant has not been previously reported.
key_quotes: KCNH2:c.917-3T>C has not been previously reported; however, splice-site analysis suggests that the tentative consequence of this variant is disruption the splice acceptor of exon 5.

functional_data.summary: Functional assessment determined that Kv11.1 channels carrying p.R328C were normally trafficked to the membrane and conferred no functional phenotype.

variants.additional_notes: The p.R328C variant is likely a rare polymorphism.
key_quotes: Further functional assessment of KCNH2:p.R328C by Anderson et al. (2006) determined the Kv11.1 channels carrying p.R328C were normally trafficked to the membrane and conferred no functional phenotype.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for KCNH2 variants were extracted from the main text.
